hero_description: Medieval Tower is an RPG / Simulation / Management game where the player explores an infinite tower, with each floor being a unique world. Freedom, effort, and immersion are at the heart of the gameplay.
feature_explore_desc: Discover a tower with infinite floors, each offering a unique world to explore.
feature_rpg_desc: Create your character, develop your skills, and forge your own destiny.
feature_management_desc: Manage your resources, build your base, and plan your expeditions.
cta_desc: Join our Discord community to follow the development and chat with other players.
footer_subtitle: An immersive RPG in an infinite tower
about_p1: Medieval Tower was born from a passion for role-playing games where player freedom and immersion are paramount. Our vision is to create a unique experience, an ever-evolving world where every playthrough is different.
about_p2: The concept of the infinite tower allows us to offer endlessly renewed content, with floors featuring varied biomes, enemies, and treasures. The player is not just an adventurer, but also a manager who must grow their base to venture ever further.
about_vision_p1: We believe in gameplay based on effort and reward. In Medieval Tower, nothing is given, everything is earned. Every success, every conquered floor, every collected resource is the result of the player's strategy and perseverance.
about_team_p1: We are a small team of passionate developers, united by a love for medieval fantasy worlds and complex game systems. Our goal is to share our passion with you through this ambitious project.
